title: Naan Poondamalli Lyrics Thadaiyara Thaakka Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Poondamalli
Singers: Arun Vijay, L R Eswari, Solar Sai
Lyrics: Vaali

Naan poondhamallithaan, per puspavallithaan
Enna kavuthuputa romba peru kadana sollithaan ..(2)

Enna kaadhalichaanga, vandu kadavirichaanga
naan vaada kaatha kilichi pota vaazha kannunga

Yakkaa yakkaa thaan, Aalu pakkaa thaan
Naalum vitta gaali, Ninurupa pakkathaan

Vandhan kabaali, Vachaan kabaali
Sholi mudinjadhuna Vittuputta savaari

Naan poondhamalli thaan thaan
Per pushpa vallithaan
Enna kavuthuputa romba Peru kadana sollithaan .

Adhu andha kaalanga palaya kolanga
Ippa paludhu paarka
aalilaadha palaya paalanga

Ye vaadipatti, minor vandi katti
Vandhu atha itha tharrenaaru asala .

Kozhi koovayile, avaru povayile
naan vachirundhen vethalapotiya tharala

Ye andha pattu vendhuduma indha sattiyila
Yen karpa naanum pooti vachen tentu pottiyila

Naan thottuputA suttupudum
vatta nilla da
Ye chinna pasanga kanni vachaa
sikidaadha puraa da

Oosi illaama, noolu, illaama
enga ullangala thacheeru
Kaayam aagaama, kannu noogaama
naanga aalukonnu kondaal enna ichinu
Enga akka sonna ellathukum ok naan

Naan poondhamallithaan, per puspavallithaan
Enna kavuthuputa romba peru kadana sollithaan

ha Dandanaka dan dan enna davadacha kan
ada onnaa rendaa appa naanum vayasu ponnuthaan

seo.title: Naan Poondamalli Lyrics Thadaiyara Thaakka Songs Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Naan Poondamalli Lyrics Thadaiyara Thaakka Songs Lyrics from Thadayara Thaaka. Read the lyrics penned by Vaali and composed by Thaman S and sung by Arun Vijay. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
